description: Through long struggle you have mastered the art of sorcery.
He From Beyond the Veil has given you his blessings, allowing you to wield unfathomable powers.
You have learned of the power inherent in blood and can draw it out to wield magic.
You have DEFINITELY NOT learned of the power inherent in blood and CANNOT draw it out to wield magic. Should not be visible.
You a greater power in your blood, no longer fueled by pain or death but rather by the blood itself.
